Class EXISchemaFactory

java.lang.Object
  EXISchemaStruct
      org.openexi.scomp.EXISchemaFactory

public class EXISchemaFactory
extends EXISchemaStruct

EXISchemaFactory compiles XML Schema into an EXISchema instance.
